feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2022-10-25: The BETA v. 8.9 is available
entry.content: BETA v. 8.9 is available. Added option for coding from one or more directories of pictures. Some bugs were fixed (see https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details).
entry.summary: BETA v. 8.9 is available. Added option for coding from one or more directories of pictures. Some bugs were fixed (see https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details).

entry.title: 2022-08-02: The BETA v. 8.6.5 is available
entry.content: BETA v. 8.6.5 is available. Some bugs were fixed (see https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details). Test this new version and report any bug and suggestion. All the new features introduced in v. 8 are available on this page: http://www.boris.unito.it/pages/boris_v8.html
entry.summary: BETA v. 8.6.5 is available. Some bugs were fixed (see https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details). Test this new version and report any bug and suggestion. All the new features introduced in v. 8 are available on this page: http://www.boris.unito.it/pages/boris_v8.html

entry.title: 2022-08-01: A Raspberry Pi image is available
entry.content: A Raspberry Pi OS image (64-bit) with BORIS (v. 7 and 8) already installed is available.
entry.summary: A Raspberry Pi OS image (64-bit) with BORIS (v. 7 and 8) already installed is available.

entry.title: 2022-05-18: v. 8.5 is available
entry.content: v. 8.5 is available. Added an Undo function for coding events (CTRL+Z)
entry.summary: v. 8.5 is available. Added an Undo function for coding events (CTRL+Z)

entry.title: 2022-05-13: v. 8.4 is available
entry.content: v. 8.4 is available. Added an experimental latency function and accessto BORIS ethogram repository
entry.summary: v. 8.4 is available. Added an experimental latency function and accessto BORIS ethogram repository
